bibl.title: The Egyptian Mysteries. (Arkana Paperbacks.)
bibl.note: Examines the ancient Egyptian Mystery tradition, from the origins to the Graeco-Roman period. Specific chapters are devoted to Isis, Osiris, Typhon and Hermanubis.
Versluis Arthur, The Egyptian Mysteries. (Arkana Paperbacks.)
London - New York, Routledge, 1988, 8°, vi-169 pp. £5.95.
